local_intent: Open the fridge hinged door and confirm it is open, assuming the handle is already grasped and end-effector yaw is set.
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT by ensuring yaw=90, executing OpenContainer on 'fridge_door' with container_type 'hinged_door' (timeout 1500), allowing swing time (Wait 400), and verifying with ContainerOpen; uses a Fallback to skip action if already open.
